summary: The implementation comprehensively addresses all requirements for the sign-up page with profile information fields. All frontend form fields (age, handicap, gender, lookingFor, bio, location, homeCourse, profilePhoto) are implemented with proper validation. All backend UserProfile fields are added and handled. The SignUpPage component is created with routing configured. Golf-themed styling using shadcn/ui components is applied. Form submission is wired to backend with validation, error handling, and loading states.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) implementing data migration from OldUserProfile to NewUserProfile with default values for new fields
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested data migration functionality or handling of existing profile data. The BuildRequest only specified adding new fields to UserProfile type, not migrating existing data.

hallucinated_features.description: ProfileSetup component as a separate flow for users without profiles after authentication
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specified a single SignUpPage that users navigate to from the landing page Get Started button. There was no requirement for a separate profile setup flow for authenticated users without profiles.

hallucinated_features.description: Preference field and type (business, pleasure, casual, romantic) in UserProfile
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest requirements only specified age, handicap, gender, lookingFor, bio, location, homeCourse, and profilePhoto fields. The Preference field was not requested.
